channel.title: I made my own object now can i put like a command on it
channel.description: Lets say i added a new Portal in Varrock middle and i want it to teleport to tzhaar cave with one click on the portal how can i do that? i will try to search my client.java for more clues...

item.title: I made my own object now can i put like a command on it
item.dc:creator: @Zirakac Zirakac
item.description:
@Zirakac wrote:

where do u add them? [with more details plz tell]

Read full topic
item.source: I made my own object now can i put like a command on it

item.title: I made my own object now can i put like a command on it
item.dc:creator: @da_crip da crip
item.description:
@da_crip wrote:

search for 2469 until u see this:

if (objectID == 2469) // portal { teleportToX = (took my coords out here); teleportToY = (took my coords out here); }

then under that after the last } add this:

if (objectID == OBJECTIDHERE) // portal
{
teleportToX = XXXX;
teleportToY = XXXX;
}

fill in the X’s with the coords and save and compile and it should work

Read full topic
item.source: I made my own object now can i put like a command on it
